deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: only the owner of the contract can call this function
only the seller can call this function
The function cannot be called at the current state.

Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether (timer/dashboard)
 Can only be called by the smart contract owner before
 the contract is filled.

Confirm the purchase as buyer.
 Transaction has to include `2 * value` ether.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived
 is called.

Confirm that the smart contract's owner received the item.
 This will release the locked ether.

This function refunds the seller, i.e.
 pays back the locked funds of the seller.
only the owner of the contract can call this function
only the seller can call this function
The function cannot be called at the current state.

Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether (timer/dashboard)
 Can only be called by the smart contract owner before
 the contract is filled.

Confirm the purchase as buyer.
 Transaction has to include `2 * value` ether.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived
 is called.

Confirm that the smart contract's owner received the item.
 This will release the locked ether.

This function refunds the seller, i.e.
 pays back the locked funds of the seller.

InvalidState().notice: The function cannot be called at the current state.

OnlyOwner().notice: only the owner of the contract can call this function

OnlySeller().notice: only the seller can call this function

abort().notice: Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether (timer/dashboard) Can only be called by the smart contract owner before the contract is filled.

confirmPurchase().notice: Confirm the purchase as buyer. Transaction has to include `2 * value` ether. The ether will be locked until confirmReceived is called.

confirmReceived(uint256).notice: Confirm that the smart contract's owner received the item. This will release the locked ether.

refundOwner().notice: This function refunds the seller, i.e. pays back the locked funds of the seller.
